pages.title: Binding Card (Dimensional)
pages.text: A Binding Card (Dimensional) is used to link a player with a $(l:item_charging/player_transmitter)Player Transmitter$(/l) to provide cable-less charging across dimension. For example, a Player Transmitter can be in the Overworld and still charge items in your inventory when you're in the Nether. $(p)A Binding Card (Dimensional) is created by holding a $(l:item_charging/binding_card)Binding Card$(/l) and right-clicking an Enderman or Endermite. $(p)A Binding Card (Dimensional) must be linked to a player before it is add to the Player Transmitter. Hold the Binding Card (Dimensional) and right-click to bind it to you.
A $(l:item_charging/binding_card)Binding Card $(/l)is required to craft a Binding Card (Dimensional).
